DOC.brief_title: The Effect BIS Monitorization Intraoperative Anesthetic Consumption During Coronary Artery Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This study approve Baskent University Institutional Review Board Ethics Committee ( Project No : KA13/294 ) support Baskent University Research Fund . The study conduct single university hospital ( Başkent University Hospital , Ankara , Turkey ) . Between January 2014 October 2014 , 213 patient undergoing CABG surgery assess eligibility . 163 patient exclude meet inclusion criterion . 50 patient enrol prospective-clinical trial . All patient inform nature study give write consent preoperative visit perform investigators.Diazepam 0.1 mg/kg ( Diazem® ) famotidine HCI 40 mg ( Famodin® ) give oral route patient , day surgery 11 pm midazolam 0.1 mg/kg ( Dormicum® ) give patient oral route 30 min start anesthesia . After routine 5 lead electrocardiography , pulse oximeter monitor peripheric venous arterial cannulation , endotracheal intubation perform . BIS monitoring ( BIS Quatro Sensor , Aspect Medical Systems , Inc , Norwood , MA , USA ) apply BIS group accordance manufacturer 's instruction . Anesthesia induce propofol 1-2 mg/kg fentanyl 5-7 mcg/kg intravenous route , base patient 's physical status . Muscle relaxation achieve use iv rocuronium 0.6 mg/kg . Desflurane administer calibrate vaporizer ( D-Vapor , Drager Medical AG & Co . KG , Lübeck , Germany ) group . In BIS group ( Grup B , n=25 ) desflurane titrate maintain BIS value 40 60 . Anesthesia maintain remifentanil 0.1-0.4 mcg/kg/min , desflurane volatile agent . In MAC group ( Grup M , n=25 ) desflurane titrate within 0.7 1.3 MAC . During maintenance , patient assess hypotension ( systolic artery pressure ( SAP ) < 20 % baseline ) , bradycardia ( heart rate ( HR ) < 45 bpm ) sign inadequate anesthesia . Inadequate anesthesia define hypertension ( SAP > 20 % baseline ) , tachycardia ( HR > 100 bpm ) patient movement , eye opening , swallowing , grimacing , lacrimation sweating . In MAC group , anesthesia inadequate , desflurane concentration increase step 0.5 vol % necessary . In BIS group desflurane titrate BIS value 40 60 . If judge insufficient , infusion rate remifentanil increase 0.05 g/kg/min . Hemodynamic parameter maintain within 20 % basal value dopamine nitroglycerin , require . Dopamine administer 2-20 mcg/kg/min central venous route . Calcium noradrenaline use iv bolus need . All patient give fluid infusion maintain central venous pressure 10-15 mmHg . Hypotension initially treat 100-250 mL iv fluid bolus ; desflurane concentration reduce step 0.5 vol % finally , iv vasopressor ( dopamine , adrenaline , dobutamine ) give dose chosen practitioner . Bradycardia treat 0.5 mg atropine . Practitioners remind protocol via visual protocol room . Morphine 0.1 mg/kg give patient pain control . All patient transfer ICU . Applying priory power analysis , 24 patient least enrolled group detect reduction 20 % least desflurane consumption risk 0.05 statistical power 0.8 . Vanderbilt University power sample size calculation program use power analysis . Data present median ( interquantile range ) , percentages , number case . Continuous data compare Mann-Whitney test . Categorical data compare ki-square test . Significance define P value less 0.05 use two-tailed test . Data analysis perform use IBM-SPSS version 20.0 ( IBM-SPSS Science Inc. , Chicago , IL ) .
